name: Jamaican Janga
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 pound cooked medium-size shrimp, peeled and deveined

recipeInstructions.text: In a small nonreactive saucepan, prepare a marinade, using all the ingredients except the shrimp. Heat the marinade over a medium flame until it boils.
Place the cleaned shrimp in a crock. Pour the boiling marinade over the shrimp. Cover the crock and store it in the refrigerator for at least 12 hours before serving. Serve chilled.
